content: Can you solve this multi-step riddle that involves identifying a specific marine creature? What is the name of the warm-blooded mammal with a thick fur coat that is able to swim in the ocean, but is not able to survive underwater without coming up for air?

The creature you're describing is a sea otter. Sea otters are warm-blooded marine mammals with thick fur coats. They are excellent swimmers and spend much of their time in the ocean, but they must come up for air to breathe, as they cannot survive underwater indefinitely.
